name: Toasted Clove Punch
description: This punch smells like Christmas, with bobbing bits of whole allspice celebrating along with all the partygoers.
recipeIngredient: 12 1/2 ounces (about 1 1/2 cups) Gosling's Black Seal rum
20 ounces (2 1/2 cups) freshly squeezed lemon juice

recipeInstructions.text: Pierce orange with cloves. Holding the orange with a fork, torch the cloves with a brulée torch until fragrant.
Combine all three rums, lemon juice, demerara syrup, and allspice in punchbowl. Add clove-pierced orange. Let sit for 20 minutes before serving, then serve in ice-filled punch glasses.
